title: How To Retrohale A Cigar
itunes:title: How To Retrohale A Cigar
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… His name is known throughout the cigar industry and throughout the halls of the Senate and Congress.  He has been working on cigar blends and our cigar rights like no other Today we are joined by Rocky Patel from Rocky Patel Cigars in the first hour as we smoke the Rocky Patel Sun Grown Maduro.

In the second hour of the show we discuss the art of retrohaling a cigar as Ed & Barry take us through the steps on how to retrohale your cigar. It’s been said by many that you are missing out on a lot of flavors if you don’t do this and this week they teach us how while we smoke the La Galera Connecticut from the Care Package.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
